name: Dove Body love Essential bodylotion
allergens: alfa-isomethylionon, benzylalcohol, citronellol, coumarine, geraniol, d-Limoleen, Linalool, hexylcinnamal
composition: INGREDIENTS: Aqua, Glycerin, Cyclopentasiloxane, Ethylhexyl Cocoate, Paraffinum Liquidum, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Caprylyl Glycol, Disodium Phosphate, Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Paraffin, Cera Microcristallina, Stearic Acid, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Triolein, Tocopherol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.
